Package spoon

Class MavenLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • spoon.Launcher
      • spoon.MavenLauncher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpoonAPI
    public class MavenLauncher
extends Launcher
    Create a Spoon launcher from a maven pom file
